title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone
overview: The biopic narrates the sensational journey of India's Most Googled celebrity star from her girl next-door image as Karenjit Kaur to the hot Sunny Leone whose videos, songs and photos made an entire generation go crazy about her. This drama reveals her history, family, boyfriend turned husband Daniel Weber and traces her transformation from an adult film star to a popular Bollywood mainstream actress.
